Detached Retina!

May 11, 2018

recovering from a detached retina.

AUTHOR NOTE: article currently being updated 2018-05-17 11:12:13

what is a detached retina.

Excellent article on PubMed (requires access)

Why it may happen

The RNIB on activities you can do

The reason I wanted to write something about my experience after reading tripe like this

So much for the data available on the internet.

For anyone active in sports activities experiencing a detached retina is quite a traumatic experience.

That was certainly the case for me, coming in a period where I was getting ready for a marathon, challenging in local squash leagues and enjoying a high level of fitness. I can think of no particular reason why this happened. No squash ball in the eye, no one punched me and I certainly had no trauma that I can recollect.
